videoSnippet.title: He Never Faced Fischer — But He Faced the Man Who Did! || Kasparov vs Spassky || Niksic 1983
videoSnippet.description:
BEST WAY TO IMPROVE YOUR CHESS https://onelink.to/lotus-agadmator
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

0:00 Hello Everyone!
01:44 Game Starts!
06:00 CNG! (Bxg4)
14:30 Pause the Video!
15:45 IWITP!
,19:50 Legends of the Channel!

Garry Kasparov vs Boris Spassky
Niksic (1983), Niksic YUG, rd 8, Sep-03
King's Indian Defense: Saemisch Variation. Panno (E84)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 g6 3. Nc3 Bg7 4. e4 d6 5. f3 Nc6 6. Be3 a6 7. Nge2 Rb8 8. Qd2 O-O 9. h4 b5 10. h5 bc4 11. g4 Bg4 12. fg4 Ng4 13. O-O-O Ne3 14. Qe3 e6 15. hg6 hg6 16. Rd2 Re8 17. Ng1 d5 18. Nf3 a5 19. e5 Ne7 20. Bh3 c5 21. dc5 Qc7 22. Qf4 Nc6 23. Re1 d4 24. Rd4 Nd4 25. Nd4 Qc5 26. Nf3 Red8 27. Ng5 Qe7 28. Qh4 Rd3 29. Qh7 Kf8 30. Ne6 fe6 31. Rf1 Ke8 32. Qg8 Bf8 33. Qg6 Kd8
